mapper.sql: charge_type, disp_no, type_name, price, unit, chips, is_valid, app_id
mapper.select:
select
from t_dict_charge tdc where tdc.charge_type = #{chargeType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and tdc.app_id = #{appId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by disp_no

select
from t_dict_charge tdc where tdc.app_id = #{appId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by charge_type ,disp_no

select
from t_dict_charge where is_valid = '1' and charge_type = (select charge_type from T_DICT_MERCHANT where merchant_code = (select owner_code from T_DEV_ACCOUNT where device_id = #{deviceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) )
mapper.insert: insert into t_dict_charge (charge_type, disp_no, type_name, price, unit, chips, is_valid, app_id) values (#{chargeType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dispNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{typeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{price,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{chips,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isValid,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{appId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into t_dict_charge
charge_type,
disp_no,
type_name,
price,
unit,
chips,
is_valid,
app_id,
#{chargeType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{dispNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{typeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{price,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{chips,jdbcType=INTEGER},

#{appId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update t_dict_charge
type_name = #{typeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
price = #{price,jdbcType=INTEGER},
unit = #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
chips = #{chips,jdbcType=INTEGER},
is_valid = #{isValid,jdbcType=CHAR},
app_id = #{appId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where charge_type = #{chargeType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and disp_no = #{dispNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
